HttpUploadFile

Upload File Each uploaded file has an HttpUploadedFile entry. More...

Detailed Description

Upload File Each uploaded file has an HttpUploadedFile entry.

This is managed by the upload handler.

API Stability:
Evolving
See also:
httpAddUploadFile httpRemoveAllUploadedFiles httpRemoveUploadFile
